text: The women's heptathlon event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 18 and 19 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Natalya Sazanovich ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Kathleen Gutjahr ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Regla Cárdeñas ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18/19 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
